attributes.review: I just can’t support such a racist platform to be in the App Store. No one should have access to this. You’re poisoning the minds of our innocent children!!
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: This app was a COMPLETE waste of my time. I don’t like it at all just like I don’t like the president. Ok bye. 🥰 also... Gen Z is coming for you Trump... get ready because we’re unstoppable.
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!

attributes.review: Trump is only letting news that he wants people to see onto the app to make himself look good. do you support a president that spreads lies to make himself look good?
attributes.title: Fake news

attributes.review: This app is the stinkiest orange 🍊 ever like it smell like a rotten sewers I do not recommend at all🧚🧚🧚 shut the app down🧚🧚🧚 Also I didn’t see a person I only saw a Cheeto that has an orange as a head💩🤢🤮😭🙁😒
attributes.title: 🦋🧚🏻‍♀️🧚‍♂️💩🟠

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app, thinking I could possibly switch my political beliefs but.. When I logged on it started flashing and glitching!
It wrote this message while the app glitched.

“Five Nights At Freddys Was Trying To Tell Us All Something!” 

The words started to drip, blood! And kids were laughing erupted in my phone. 

I’m giving this app 1 star!
attributes.title: Creepy..

attributes.review: Honestly this is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded - my phone has completely lashed out so sad that our president has done this.
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: I tapped into this app to see the crusty lookin Cheeto puff🟠and instead got a text that told me to cut off my toes🦶🏽so I did and now because of this app I’m toeless🦶🏽❌do not download this app👁👄👁
attributes.title: No just no❤️

attributes.review: I downloaded this to see if he was actually doing something good and turns out this app is run just like he’s running the country. Like a circus🤡🤡🤡
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: Runs very slow and shows horrible images
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: Very bad and negative content/notifications are being put out from this app
attributes.title: Do not download
